document_data.name: House of Morning
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Morning''' was a temple of [[Lathander]], the only shrine of significance in [[Feather Falls (village)|Feather Falls]], located within [[Featherdale]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was run by [[Morninglord]] [[Jallian Horgontivar]], who himself was supported by a clergy of 16 [[cleric]]s and acolytes devoted to the deity of "dawn" and "[[Light domain|light]]".
document_data.Activity: The temple rented out spartan rooms at the cost of 1 [[gp]] per head per night. They also issued loans to local businesses.
